3: Roland! Give up already... Do you think you can get away after such a long fight with me? Don't be a fool!
I do remember you talking this much the last time I had your face under my boot.
Hey, you're not looking very well! You got a stomach ache? Need a lie-down from the heat?
You are stronger, I'll give you that. Not smarter, though.
I've been luring you to Ascendant territory, and your monkey brain followed.
Grotesque, corroded Corrupted crawl out of the sand.
Uh... Oh! I know something's wrong with you! You wouldn't have asked for help otherwise, would you?
(Takes a look at the gold dust flowing past him in the air) You're... you're so dead.
Since when were you like this...?
I've been fighting you all along the coasts of the Atlantic Ocean since South Africa, and you've barely skipped a bit... But the second we got here, you're acting all... constipated.
(Looks up) Huh? What are you looking at? Is it... the gold dust? Oh, I think I get it...
